definitions.definition: The act of arriving ( reaching a certain place ) .
examples: The early arrival of the bride created a stir.

definitions.definition: The fact of reaching a particular point in time.
examples: He celebrated the arrival of payday with a shopping spree.

definitions.definition: The fact of beginning to occur ; the initial phase of something.
examples: The arrival of puberty can be especially challenging for transgender youth.

definitions.definition: The attainment of an objective , especially as a result of effort .
examples: The arrival of the railway made the local tourist industry viable.

definitions.definition: A person who has arrived; a thing that has arrived.
examples: There has been a significant growth in illegal arrivals .

main_definition: The act of arriving ( reaching a certain place ) .
secondary_definitions: The fact of reaching a particular point in time.
The fact of beginning to occur ; the initial phase of something.
The attainment of an objective , especially as a result of effort .
A person who has arrived; a thing that has arrived.
